name: Time's Up (Assankhan Amirov)
description:
Time's Up

------------------------------------------------------------

Time's Up - is an isometric platformer with elements of Time Manipulation. Play as SEC - short for Semi-Auto Electronic Companion, a cute orange robot who can use his robot powers to slow down time around him, and reverse the time for certain objects. Help SEC navigate his way around cyberspace to complete his technical tasks! 

------------------------------------------------------------

IMPORTANT!

If your game doesn't run well in Chrome use Safari and Edge!

------------------------------------------------------------
